DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : FILM : JEFF BRIDGES TO GET STAR ON WALK OF FAME
DOC.TEXT: Actor Jeff Bridges , star of the summer action thriller " Blown Away " and three-time Academy Award nominee , will receive a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on Monday . The veteran actor will have his star placed next to that of his father , actor Lloyd Bridges . Nominated for his first Oscar for Best Supporting Actor in Peter Bogdanovich ' s 1971 film " The Last Picture_Show , " the 44-year-old thespian has starred in more_than three dozen movies since his debut , at the age of four months , in " The Company She Keeps " with Jane Greer .
